features:
*Case is able to be submerged under 1 meter of water for up to 30 minutes in accordance with IP67 testing parameters
Watertight, crushproof, and dustproof
Automatic Pressure Equalization Valve - balances interior pressure, keeps water out
Carabiner
Easy open latch
Lifetime Guarantee of Excellence
Rubber liner for extra protection doubles as o-ring seal
Stainless steel hardware
INTERIOR (L X W X D): 5.31" x 3.56" x 1.68" (13.5 x 9 x 4.3 cm)
EXTERIOR (L X W X D): 6.82" x 4.75" x 2.12" (17.3 x 12.1 x 5.4 cm)
LID DEPTH:  0.69" (1.8 cm)
BOTTOM DEPTH:  0.94" (2.4 cm)
TOTAL DEPTH:  1.63" (4.1 cm)
INT VOLUME:  0.02 ft³ (0.001 m³)
WEIGHT WITH FOAM:  0.56 lbs (0.3 kg)
WEIGHT EMPTY:  0.55 lbs (0.2 kg)
BUOYANCY:  0.75 lbs (0.3 kg)
FOAM LAYERS: Layer 1 (Lid): 0.13" - Pad  /  Layer 2 (Base): 0.90" - Pick N Pluck
BODY: Polycarbonate (PC)
LATCH: Xylex
O-RING: Thermoplastic Rubber
PINS: Stainless Steel
FOAM: TL - 426 4 lb. Esther
PURGE BODY: Polycarbonate (PC)
PURGE VENT: Polyester Spun-Bond ePTFE Oleophobic
MINIMUM TEMPERATURE:  -10° F (-23 ° C)
MAXIMUM TEMPERATURE:  199° F (93 ° C)
